items.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 17, 2025
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Admin

*   [impostor (‚≠ê160)](https://github.com/avallbona/Impostor) - Impostor is a Django application which allows staff members to log in as a different user by using their own username and password.

### Third-Party Packages / Configuration

*   [django-removals (‚≠ê63)](https://github.com/ambient-innovation/django-removals/) - Detect deprecated settings variables via convenient system checks
*   [django-classy-settings (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/funkybob/django-classy-settings) - Class-based settings to keep your environments in order, with easy access to typed environment variables.

### Third-Party Packages / Editors

*   [django-prose (‚≠ê214)](https://github.com/withlogicco/django-prose) - A lightweight editor for content creation.

### Third-Party Packages / Forms

*   [django-formtools (‚≠ê850)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-formtools) - For form previous and multistep forms, previously part of Django until 1.8.

### Third-Party Packages / Models

*   [django-treenode (‚≠ê758)](https://github.com/fabiocaccamo/django-treenode) - Abstract model/admin for tree-based stuff.

### Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

*   [django-celery-results (‚≠ê742)](https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results) - Celery result backend with Django.
*   [django-tasks (‚≠ê612)](https://github.com/realOrangeOne/django-tasks) - A reference implementation and backport of background workers and tasks in Django, based on [DEP 14](https://www.djangoproject.com/weblog/2024/may/29/django-enhancement-proposal-14-background-workers/).

### Third-Party Packages / Users

*   [django-allauth-ui (‚≠ê342)](https://github.com/danihodovic/django-allauth-ui/) - Better-looking templates for django-allauth.

### Projects / Boilerplate

*   [django-docker-template (‚≠ê217)](https://github.com/amerkurev/django-docker-template) - Dockerized Django with Postgres, Gunicorn, and Traefik (with auto-renew Let's Encrypt).
*   [wemake-django-template (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/wemake-services/wemake-django-template/) - Bleeding-edge Django template focused on code quality and security.

### Projects / Open Source Projects

*   [linkding (‚≠ê8.6k)](https://github.com/sissbruecker/linkding) - Self-hosted bookmark manager that is designed to be minimal, fast, and easy to set up using Docker.

items.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 15, 2025
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Admin

*   [django-hijack (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/django-hijack/django-hijack) - Admins can log in and work on behalf of other users without having to know their credentials.

### Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

*   [django-jet-reboot (‚≠ê471)](https://github.com/assem-ch/django-jet-reboot) - Django Jet is modern template for Django admin interface with improved functionality.

### Third-Party Packages / APIs

*   [dj-rest-auth (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/iMerica/dj-rest-auth) - Authentication for Django Rest Framework.
*   [django-rest-knox (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-rest-knox) - Authentication Module for django-rest-auth.
*   [django-rest-framework-simplejwt (‚≠ê4.2k)](https://github.com/jazzband/djangorestframework-simplejwt) - JSON web tokens for DRF.
*   [django-webpack-loader (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/django-webpack/django-webpack-loader) - Transparently use webpack with Django.

### Third-Party Packages / Commands

*   [django-click (‚≠ê278)](https://github.com/django-commons/django-click) - Write Django management commands using the [click CLI library](https://click.palletsprojects.com).
*   [django-dbbackup (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-dbbackup) - Management commands to help backup and restore your project database and media files.
*   [django-typer (‚≠ê211)](https://github.com/django-commons/django-typer) - Write Django management commands using the [Typer CLI library](https://typer.tiangolo.com).

### Third-Party Packages / Configuration

*   [django-split-settings (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/wemake-services/django-split-settings) - Organize multiple settings files.

### Third-Party Packages / Content Management Systems

*   [django-cms (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/django-cms/django-cms) - CMS for Django.

### Third-Party Packages / ECommerce

*   [saleor (‚≠ê22k)](https://github.com/saleor/saleor) - GraphQL-based Django E-Commerce Platform.

### Third-Party Packages / Editors

*   [django-markdownx (‚≠ê910)](https://github.com/neutronX/django-markdownx) - Comprehensive Markdown plugin built for Django.
*   [django-summernote (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/lqez/django-summernote) - Summernote is a simple WYSIWYG editor.

### Third-Party Packages / General

*   [django-sql-explorer (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/explorerhq/sql-explorer) - Share data via SQL queries.

### Third-Party Packages / Logging

*   [django-guid (‚≠ê465)](https://github.com/snok/django-guid) - Inject a GUID (Correlation-ID) into every log message in a Django request.

### Third-Party Packages / Models

*   [django-polymorphic (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-polymorphic) - Django-polymorphic simplifies using inherited models in Django projects.
*   [django-recurrence (‚≠ê517)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-recurrence) - Utility for working with recurring dates in Django.

### Third-Party Packages / Security

*   [django-feature-policy (‚≠ê107)](https://github.com/adamchainz/django-permissions-policy) - Set the draft security HTTP header `Feature-Policy` on a Django app.

### Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

*   [django-redis (‚≠ê3k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-redis) - Full-featured Redis cache backend for Django.

### Third-Party Packages / Templates

*   [django-components (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/django-components/django-components/) - A way to create simple reusable template components in Django.

### Third-Party Packages / Testing

*   [django-debug-toolbar (‚≠ê8.3k)](https://github.com/django-commons/django-debug-toolbar/) - Configurable panels to debug requests/responses.
*   [django-waffle (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-waffle) - A feature flipper for Django.

### Third-Party Packages / URLs

*   [dj-database-url (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/jazzband/dj-database-url) - Database URLs.

### Third-Party Packages / Users

*   [django-improved-user (‚≠ê154)](https://github.com/jambonrose/django-improved-user) - A custom Django user that authenticates via email. Follows identity and authentication best practices.

### Third-Party Packages / Views

*   [django-vanilla-views (‚≠ê985)](https://github.com/encode/django-vanilla-views) - Simpler class-based views in Django.

### Python Packages / Views

*   [python-decouple (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/HBNetwork/python-decouple) - Strict separation of settings from code.

### Projects / Boilerplate

*   [cookiecutter-django (‚≠ê13k)](https://github.com/cookiecutter/cookiecutter-django/) - A full-bodied starter project, highly customizable.
*   [djangox (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/wsvincent/lithium/) - Batteries included starter project for Pip, Pipenv, or Docker.
*   [Falco (‚≠ê387)](https://github.com/falcopackages/falco-cli) - Enhance your Django developer experience: CLI and Guides for the Modern Django Developer.

items.title: Awesome Django Updates on Dec 08, 2024
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Admin

*   [django-related-admin (‚≠ê71)](https://github.com/PetrDlouhy/django-related-admin) - A helper library that allows you to write list\_displays across foreign key relationships.
*   [django-admin-sortable2 (‚≠ê843)](https://github.com/jrief/django-admin-sortable2) - Generic drag-and-drop ordering for objects in the Django admin interface.

### Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

*   [django-grappelli (‚≠ê3.9k)](https://github.com/sehmaschine/django-grappelli) - A jazzy skin for the admin.
*   [django-jazzmin (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/farridav/django-jazzmin) - Drop-in theme for django admin, that utilises AdminLTE 3 & Bootstrap 4 to make yo' admin look jazzy.
*   [django-daisy (‚≠ê257)](https://github.com/hypy13/django-daisy) - A modern django dashboard fully responsive built with daisyui.

### Third-Party Packages / Performance

*   [django-zeal (‚≠ê145)](https://github.com/taobojlen/django-zeal) - Detect N+1 queries with user-friendly error messages

### Third-Party Packages / Templates

*   [htpy](https://htpy.dev/) - htpy is a library that makes writing HTML in plain Python fun and efficient, without a template language.

items.title: Awesome Django Updates on Oct 25, 2024
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

*   [django-unfold (‚≠ê2.7k)](https://github.com/unfoldadmin/django-unfold) - Modern Django admin theme for seamless interface development.

### Third-Party Packages / Configuration

*   [django-content-settings](https://django-content-settings.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) - Easily create and manage editable typed variables directly from the Django admin panel.

### Third-Party Packages / General

*   [Django-Classy-Doc (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/nanuxbe/django-classy-doc) - Document your own code in the style of CCBV and CDRF.

### Third-Party Packages / Mailing

*   [django-anymail (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/anymail/django-anymail) - Django email backends and webhooks for Amazon SES, Brevo (Sendinblue), MailerSend, Mailgun, Mailjet, Postmark, Postal, Resend, SendGrid, SparkPost, Unisender Go and more.

### Resources / Community

*   [Local Django Communities Page](https://www.djangoproject.com/community/local/) - Featuring local events all around the world.
*   [X (formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/djangoproject/) - For official announcements on updates, security fixes, etc.

### Resources / Videos

*   [DjangoTV](https://djangotv.com) - Your source for Django conference videos and tutorials.
*   [PyVideo](https://pyvideo.org) - PyVideo is an index of Python related media.

### Projects / Open Source Projects

items.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jul 04, 2020
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Admin

*   [django-import-export (‚≠ê3.2k)](https://github.com/django-import-export/django-import-export) - Django application and library for importing and exporting data with admin integration.
*   [django-loginas (‚≠ê370)](https://github.com/skorokithakis/django-loginas) - "Log in as user" for the Django admin.

### Third-Party Packages / Async

*   [channels (‚≠ê6.3k)](https://github.com/django/channels/) - Async support for Django.
*   [starlette (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/encode/starlette) - ASGI framework.

### Third-Party Packages / Commands

*   [django-extensions (‚≠ê6.7k)](https://github.com/django-extensions/django-extensions/) - Custom management extensions, notably `runserver_plus` and `shell_plus`.

### Third-Party Packages / Configuration

*   [confidential (‚≠ê76)](https://github.com/candidco/confidential) - Manage configs and secrets (with CLI support).
*   [django-environ (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/joke2k/django-environ) - Environment variables.
*   [django-constance (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-constance) - A Django app for storing dynamic settings in pluggable backends (Redis and Django model backend built in) with an integration with the Django admin app.

### Third-Party Packages / Content Management Systems

*   [mezzanine (‚≠ê4.8k)](https://github.com/stephenmcd/mezzanine) - CMS framework.
*   [puput (‚≠ê654)](https://github.com/APSL/puput) - Blog app features with Wagtail.

### Third-Party Packages / ECommerce

*   [django-shop (‚≠ê3.3k)](https://github.com/awesto/django-shop) - Django-based shop system.
*   [shuup (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/shuup/shuup) - Django E-Commerce Platform.
*   [django-oscar (‚≠ê6.4k)](https://github.com/django-oscar/django-oscar) - Domain-driven e-commerce for Django.

### Third-Party Packages / Files/Images

*   [django-cleanup (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/un1t/django-cleanup) - Zero configuration file/image removal for local and remote files.

### Third-Party Packages / Forms

*   [django-crispy-forms (‚≠ê5.1k)](https://github.com/django-crispy-forms/django-crispy-forms/) - DRY Django forms.
*   [django-widget-tweaks (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-widget-tweaks) - Tweak form field rendering in templates.
*   [django-autocomplete-light (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/yourlabs/django-autocomplete-light) - Add autocompletion to forms.

### Third-Party Packages / Model Fields

*   [django-model-utils (‚≠ê2.7k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-model-utils) - Django model mixins and utilities.
*   [django-money (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/django-money/django-money) - Money fields for forms/models.
*   [django-phonenumber-field (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/stefanfoulis/django-phonenumber-field) - Model/form field for normalized phone numbers.

### Third-Party Packages / Models

*   [django-taggit (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-taggit/) - Simple model tags.
*   [django-reversion (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/etianen/django-reversion) - Version control for model instances.

### Third-Party Packages / Performance

*   [django-perf-rec](https://cur.at/GHUO6cn?m=web) - Keep detailed records of the performance of your Django code.
*   [New Relic](https://newrelic.com/python/django) - Time middleware, views, and SQL queries.
*   [django-query-profiler (‚≠ê141)](https://github.com/django-query-profiler/django-query-profiler) - Django query profiler to help resolve N+1 queries.
*   [py-spy (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/benfred/py-spy) - Sampling profiler for Python programs.

### Third-Party Packages / Search

*   [django-haystack (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/django-haystack/django-haystack) - Modular search for Django.
*   [django-watson (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/etianen/django-watson) - Full-text search plugin.

### Third-Party Packages / Static Assets

*   [django-storages (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/jschneier/django-storages) - A single library to support multiple custom storage backends for Django.
*   [django-compressor (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/django-compressor/django-compressor/) - Compress JavaScript/CSS into a single cached file.
*   [easy-thumbnails (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/SmileyChris/easy-thumbnails) - Image thumbnails for Django.

### Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

*   [beatserver (‚≠ê142)](https://github.com/rajasimon/beatserver) - A periodic task scheduler for Django.
*   [django-rq (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/rq/django-rq) - Integration for Redis Queue.
*   [celery (‚≠ê27k)](https://github.com/celery/celery) - Robust and broker-agnostic task queues for bigger, performance-focused projects.

### Third-Party Packages / Testing

*   [pytest-django (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-django) - Use pytest features in Django.
*   [django-test-migrations (‚≠ê555)](https://github.com/wemake-services/django-test-migrations) - Test django schema and data migrations, including migrations' order.
*   [django-test-plus (‚≠ê626)](https://github.com/revsys/django-test-plus/) - Useful additions to Django's default TestCase.
*   [factory-boy (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/FactoryBoy/factory_boy) - Test fixtures replacement.
*   [model-bakery (‚≠ê908)](https://github.com/model-bakers/model_bakery) - Object factory for Django (rename of legacy Model Mommy project).

### Third-Party Packages / URLs

*   [urlman (‚≠ê122)](https://github.com/andrewgodwin/urlman) - A nicer way to do URLs for Django models.
*   [django-robots (‚≠ê474)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-robots) - This is a basic Django application to manage robots.txt files following the robots exclusion protocol, complementing the Django Sitemap contrib app.

### Third-Party Packages / Users

*   [django-allauth (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/pennersr/django-allauth/) - Improved user registration including social auth.
*   [django-organizations (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/bennylope/django-organizations/) - Multi-user accounts for Django projects.
*   [django-cas-ng (‚≠ê390)](https://github.com/django-cas-ng/django-cas-ng) - Django-cas-ng is Django CAS (Central Authentication Service) 1.0/2.0/3.0 client library to support SSO (Single Sign On) and Single Logout (SLO).

### Third-Party Packages / Views

items.content_html:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-import-export (‚≠ê3.2k) - Django application and library for importing and exporting data with admin integration.
  • django-loginas (‚≠ê370) - "Log in as user" for the Django admin.

Third-Party Packages / Async

  • channels (‚≠ê6.3k) - Async support for Django.
  • starlette (‚≠ê11k) - ASGI framework.

Third-Party Packages / Commands

  • django-extensions (‚≠ê6.7k) - Custom management extensions, notably runserver_plus and shell_plus.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • confidential (‚≠ê76) - Manage configs and secrets (with CLI support).
  • django-environ (‚≠ê3.1k) - Environment variables.
  • django-constance (‚≠ê1.8k) - A Django app for storing dynamic settings in pluggable backends (Redis and Django model backend built in) with an integration with the Django admin app.

Third-Party Packages / Content Management Systems

  • mezzanine (‚≠ê4.8k) - CMS framework.
  • puput (‚≠ê654) - Blog app features with Wagtail.

Third-Party Packages / ECommerce

  • django-shop (‚≠ê3.3k) - Django-based shop system.
  • shuup (‚≠ê2.3k) - Django E-Commerce Platform.
  • django-oscar (‚≠ê6.4k) - Domain-driven e-commerce for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Files/Images

  • django-cleanup (‚≠ê1.2k) - Zero configuration file/image removal for local and remote files.

Third-Party Packages / Forms

  • django-crispy-forms (‚≠ê5.1k) - DRY Django forms.
  • django-widget-tweaks (‚≠ê2.1k) - Tweak form field rendering in templates.
  • django-autocomplete-light (‚≠ê1.8k) - Add autocompletion to forms.

Third-Party Packages / Model Fields

  • django-model-utils (‚≠ê2.7k) - Django model mixins and utilities.
  • django-money (‚≠ê1.7k) - Money fields for forms/models.
  • django-phonenumber-field (‚≠ê1.5k) - Model/form field for normalized phone numbers.

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-taggit (‚≠ê3.4k) - Simple model tags.
  • django-reversion (‚≠ê3.1k) - Version control for model instances.

Third-Party Packages / Performance

  • django-perf-rec - Keep detailed records of the performance of your Django code.
  • New Relic - Time middleware, views, and SQL queries.
  • django-query-profiler (‚≠ê141) - Django query profiler to help resolve N+1 queries.
  • py-spy (‚≠ê14k) - Sampling profiler for Python programs.

Third-Party Packages / Search

  • django-haystack (‚≠ê3.7k) - Modular search for Django.
  • django-watson (‚≠ê1.2k) - Full-text search plugin.

Third-Party Packages / Static Assets

  • django-storages (‚≠ê2.9k) - A single library to support multiple custom storage backends for Django.
  • django-compressor (‚≠ê2.8k) - Compress JavaScript/CSS into a single cached file.
  • easy-thumbnails (‚≠ê1.4k) - Image thumbnails for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • beatserver (‚≠ê142) - A periodic task scheduler for Django.
  • django-rq (‚≠ê1.9k) - Integration for Redis Queue.
  • celery (‚≠ê27k) - Robust and broker-agnostic task queues for bigger, performance-focused projects.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • pytest-django (‚≠ê1.5k) - Use pytest features in Django.
  • django-test-migrations (‚≠ê555) - Test django schema and data migrations, including migrations' order.
  • django-test-plus (‚≠ê626) - Useful additions to Django's default TestCase.
  • factory-boy (‚≠ê3.7k) - Test fixtures replacement.
  • model-bakery (‚≠ê908) - Object factory for Django (rename of legacy Model Mommy project).

Third-Party Packages / URLs

  • urlman (‚≠ê122) - A nicer way to do URLs for Django models.
  • django-robots (‚≠ê474) - This is a basic Django application to manage robots.txt files following the robots exclusion protocol, complementing the Django Sitemap contrib app.

Third-Party Packages / Users

  • django-allauth (‚≠ê10k) - Improved user registration including social auth.
  • django-organizations (‚≠ê1.3k) - Multi-user accounts for Django projects.
  • django-cas-ng (‚≠ê390) - Django-cas-ng is Django CAS (Central Authentication Service) 1.0/2.0/3.0 client library to support SSO (Single Sign On) and Single Logout (SLO).

  • Built with Django - Curated list of awesome Django projects.
